'''Radiant Spincrystal 27''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Clear Sky Over Liyue]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the Southern Wharf of [[Liyue Harbor]], on a ledge of a window.
